Home Design

About

For more than 9 years, Kat Guzmán has led product design for iOS, Android, and web platforms. She has delivered user-centric products, and brought measurable business results to a wide variety of industries, including fintech, edtech, finance, gaming, and social networks. All her designs reflect her talent for intuitive, visually appealing user experiences.

In addition to her design work, she has produced many original, consummately crafted drawings. Her gift for visual beauty is clear in the work showcased here. She resides in New York City, and takes every opportunity to enjoy the city’s art and design scene. During her free time, Kat enjoys walking in Central Park, tea, and K-pop.
